section.title: Developer Documentation and References
section.para: Xaraya has information on its architecture, the functions provided by the core and the general best practises in a few places

listitem.para: The RFCs of Xaraya are a very important source of information. They provide the planning and implementation of several parts in Xaraya. When reading an RFC, you should note the date of release and last update.
The Xaraya RFC can be found via the documentation section at http://www.xaraya.com.

The core files of Xaraya have header information. This information is used to generate phpdocumentation and an xref index. You can find this information via the documentation section at http://www.xaraya.com
The XarBB module is used as a forum on the community area of the Xaraya website. The developers forum is a good source of FAQ type of information. You should visit it

section.title: Support forums, newsgroups, lists & IRC
section.para: The forum at xaraya.com has already been introduced. The IRC server at irc.xaraya.com serves several rooms. You should definitively visit #xaraya.support with questions you might have regarding development.
Most developers prefer the ease of a mailinglist. The developers mailinglist is a great source of information. You can search it via your favourite newsreader or via the Xaraya website.
